title: Cinco de Mayo
description: Fiesta, Fiesta! Come party at the Padre Hotel for Cinco de Mayo! Head up the Prairie Fire rooftop from 6pm to 12am and sip on $5 Coronas, margaritas and Herradura shots! Keep your tummy full will tradtional faves, we're serving up $1 tacos plus $5 nachos and churros! Olé!
